subject: RE: [junit] Re: What's the deal with the frog?
msgSnippet: So said  Josh Knowles  on  2003-02-25 -------------------- ... JUnit ... along ... I prefer to promote good use of JUnit to fewer people than worse use of
messageBody:
So said Josh Knowles on 2003-02-25 --------------------

>> That may not be what you meant, but that's what it sounded like.
>
>I can see your point but I think it would be a good way to promote
JUnit
>and help point new testers in the right direction. It goes right
along
>with what Mike was saying about putting the frog on your website.

I prefer to promote good use of JUnit to fewer people than worse use of
JUnit to more people. I'll stick out my neck and speak for Dave on this
one.


J. B. Rainsberger,
President, Diaspar Software Services
